title: sudip76
author: sudip76
created_time: October 02, 2022, 06:41:40 PMLast edit: October 10, 2022, 03:10:37 PM by sudip76
content: WEBSITE - TELEGRAM - TWITTER -WHITEPAPER -YOUTUBE -INSTAGRAM- COINMARKETCAP 1. Bounty Campaign Starts on: 03 October. Lasts for 4 weeks.2. Tokens will be distributed to participants within 15 Days after the end of the Bounty Campaign.3. Proof Authentication post is mandatory participation.4. Any from of cheating is not allowed and will result in disqualification.5. Negative trust-rated accounts are not allowed to participate6. Complete tasks and make reports every week in this thread.7. Join the JAIL KWON's official Telegram Group 8. All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program. Code:#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Telegram Username:Participated Campaigns:BSC Wallet Address:Twitter         30%Telegram         20% Article             20%YouTube        20%Instagram           10%WEEK 1- 03 October to 09 October WEEK 2- 10 October to 16 OctoberWeekly Report Format:Code:Week: Bitcointalk Username:Telegram Username:[b]Twitter Campaign[/b]Twitter Profile Url:Spreadsheet No:Retweets/Tweets Url:1. …2. …3. …4. …5. …[b]Telegram Campaign[/b]Telegram Username:Spreadsheet No:Telegram posts Url:1. …2. …3. …4. …5. …[b]Instagram Campaign[/b]Instagram Profile Url:Spreadsheet No:Instagram posts Url1.2.3.4.5.....Rewards:  1. Have more than 500 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 3000 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5000 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,000 followers: 5 stakes/weekRules:   1. Every participant must follow JAIL KWON's Twitter Page.2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 500 followers.3. Participants have to make 2 new tweets and 3 retweets per week (maximum 1 retweet and 1 Tweet per day).4. Time gap between 2 retweets/tweets needs to be 12 hours minimum.5. Participants must use $jkwon #LunaReliefProgram #LUNCCcommunity #educate2earn #e2e  #lunc #Gems hashtags in every retweet and tweet.How to join:1. Join the JAIL KWON's official Telegram Group 3. Fill the registration form: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScBwDn3K1zs14Mki5F_gME4olZ42Wgf1gthpHn8HbVYhaf7RQ/viewform Rewards:5 stakes/weekRules:   1. Update your Telegram name to "Your Name | JAIL KWON Token Fan''. Only one project is allowed in your Telegram name.2. Replace your profile picture with JAIL KWON's Logo.3. Write at least 1 constructive messages on this group: https://t.me/jailkwontoken and 4 messages weekly in other crypto-related telegram groups with a minimum of 1k members.Posts/messages must be constructive, useful, and in a way that will not be considered as spamming.4. Deleted messages will not be counted.5. Report your telegram message links weekly.6. You must wear JAIL KWON's avatar and text until the end of the campaign.Fill the registration formhttps://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSf6ioVw9KkVYeI5cIpEx1sJ4xNM9iVimxh-C69pN5hwD9VTvA/viewformRewards: High quality: 5 stakes Good quality: 3 stakes Average quality: 1 stakeRules:1. Participants must have at least 100+ youtube subscribers. Videos need to be a minimum of 3 minutes in length.2. Each participant can send 1 video only.3. Video Content must focus on a relevant topic: project features, Meme token, latest token updates, blockchain, etc.4. Only original video content will be accepted.5. Face cam video will be highly recommended and considered. 6. Bot voices will not be rewarded. But, a good quality animation video with bot voices will be rewarded.7. Poor quality video will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on the number of engagements and quality.8. Videos should never be removed, Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.9. All videos need to have the project's website,Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel, or any other social media.10. Please provide the wallet address and enough details of the producer (bounty hunter) at the end of the video to ensure athenticity. This will be verified!Fill the registration formhttps://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfLYBpH9keDir5YySbOp3WhrjuC1-zXjq2s60UzV6ID77MnMw/viewformRewards: High quality: 5 stakesGood quality: 3 stakesAverage quality: 1 stakeRules:   1. Articles should be quality and unique with a minimum of 500 words.(Participants who copy the project's website, whitepaper or ANN thread, will not receive rewards).Views and comments at least 10 likes/comments/upvotes or 50 claps would be taken note of.2. Poor quality articles will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on quality.3. Each participant can write 1 article only.4. Articles should be published on blogs recommended by us: Steemit, Medium, and LinkedIn and must be publicly accessible.Other high-ranked blogs may be accepted.5. Content must focus on a relevant topic: project features, Pre Sale, latest token updates, blockchain, etc.6. Articles should never be removed.7. Published Articles must include at least 2 images of the project,   project's website,Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel, or any other social media.8. Please provide a Wallet address and enough details of the writer at the end of the article to ensure athenticity. This will be verified!Fill the registration formhttps://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSescNWp5FBx3MML-CgP4D-x1jo3fil4gyOfEh5P4SLjS-Ixzg/viewform1  300 to 1000 subscribers: 1 stake, per one post2  1000 to 5000 subscribers: 2 stakes, per one post3  5000-10000 subscribers: 3 stakes, per one post4  10001 subscribers: 4 stakes per one postRules:1 Must have at least 300 friends and make privacy settings open for your page.2 Follow and like the official https://www.instagram.com/jailkwon  account 3 Copy 1 posts from the official page https://www.instagram.com/jailkwon per Day.4  Like all posts on the official page.5  Post must contain  hashtag:  $jkwon #LunaReliefProgram #LUNCCcommunity #educate2earn #e2e  #lunc #GemsFill the registration formhttps://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScjdyL4ZhD2AOVXmaWmqkSw6bswY5zPrnKJphQMV9YlSbb_Xw/viewformMake sure you complete the Telegram verification and join the official chat group.
